application.name: cnetsplit
application.brief: The application cnetsplit splits the input control network into user specified number of control networks.
application.description: The application cnetsplit splits the input control network into user specified number of control networks with the user specified output name.

parameter.name: CNET
parameter.description: The control network file to be split

parameter.name: ONET_FORMAT
parameter.brief: Enter the output file name pattern
parameter.description: A string with set of question marks ("?"). This string will be used to create unique output file names. The question marks will be replaced with a number beginning with zero. For example the pattern "ControlNet????" would create point IDs "ControlNet0001" through "ControlNet0999". Note: Make sure there are enough "?"s for all the Control Networks that may be created during this run. If all question marks are exausted the program will throw an error.

parameter.name: NUM_OUTPUT_FILES
parameter.brief: Enter the number of output files the input file has to be split into
parameter.description: Enter the number of output files the input file has to be split into. The application will split input control net into the user entered number of control net with equal number of control points.
